precondition: The mouse cursor is visible on the desktop.
expected_results: A context menu will appear with options such as 'Arrange Icons By', 'Refresh', 'Paste', 'New', and 'Properties'.

precondition: The context menu on the desktop is open, and the 'Properties' option is highlighted.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the 'Display Properties' window will open.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Themes' tab is active.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' tab will become active, displaying options for customizing the screen saver settings.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the dropdown menu labeled 'Screen saver'.
expected_results: A list of available screensavers will appear.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected. The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu is open.
action: Click on the 'None' option in the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will close, and the screensaver wait time will change, indicating that 'None' has been selected as the screensaver.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active.
action: Click the 'Power...' button in the 'Monitor power' section.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will appear.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is selected.
action: Click the dropdown menu labeled 'Turn off monitor'.
expected_results: A list of time options will appear, with the currently selected option highlighted.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Settings for Home/Office Desk power scheme' section is active. The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the 'Never' option in the 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu will close, and 'Never' will be displayed as the selected option.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'OK' button is highlighted.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will close, revealing the 'Display Properties' window.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active.
action: Click the 'OK' button at the bottom of the window.
